org.cougaar.core.thread
Class PercentageLoadSelector

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.core.thread.PercentageLoadSelector
All Implemented Interfaces:
RightsSelector, ThreadListener
public class PercentageLoadSelector
extends java.lang.Object
implements ThreadListener

A sample RightsSelector that attempts to select among the children in such a way as to match a set of target percentages.

rightGiven

public void rightGiven(java.lang.String consumer)
Description copied from interface: ThreadListener
Indicates that the given scheduler has been allocated a run- right, which it will use to run one of its Schedulables. That Schedulable might be a queued one or might be a new one asking to start.

Specified by:
rightGiven in interface ThreadListener

rightReturned

Description copied from interface: ThreadListener
Indicates that some running Schedulable managed by the given Scheduler has given up its run-right.

getNextPending

public org.cougaar.core.thread.SchedulableObject getNextPending()
Description copied from interface: RightsSelector
Choose a Schedulable to get the next available right. This Schedulable might be owned by the Selector's own Scheduler or by one of the children of that Scheduler.
